intro.description: I am a postgraduate student from the University of Limpopo currently completing a 4IR technologies boot camp with the University of Johannesburg. While studying, I have attained a variety of team-oriented abilities and I believe that enthusiasm, integrity, accountability and proper work etiquette are some of my best qualities.  Technically, I believe I have the skill set to fit into a quantitative role in any financial institution. I pride myself on being a quick learner able to perform, and successfully complete individual and contribute to team work.

workExperiance.position: Writing some python code and creating functions
